author: wrowe
msg: Copy this test to live, we should be certain things are
healthy on the released branch too.

author: wrowe
msg: recvfrom() failed on most platforms with a sockaddr only
large enough to hold an ipv6 address.  Big shock.

author: jm
msg: bug 5686: first draft (warning: very hacky, lots of TODOs) of an implementation of an alternative learning classifier plugin: Winnow (a perceptron-style algorithm) with Orthogonal Sparse Bigram tokenization.  This combination scored very highly in last year's TREC shootout.  initial tests of this implementation look very promising so far ;)

author: olamy
msg: change handling zip dependency/overlay implementation in OverlayManager to not use a private fields which contains only war overlay (NOTE : with this implementation overlay can be of any type)
